SEARCH
Package org.douggschwind.games.boardgames.monopoly.space

Class BoardSpace

java.lang.Object
org.douggschwind.games.boardgames.monopoly.space.BoardSpace
Direct Known Subclasses:
PrivateBoardSpace, PublicBoardSpace
public abstract class BoardSpace extends Object
The Monopoly gameboard consists of 40 spaces containing 28 properties (22 colored streets, four railway stations and two utilities), three Chance spaces, three Community Chest spaces, a Luxury Tax space, an Income Tax space, and the four corner squares: GO, (In) Jail/Just Visiting, Free Parking, and Go to Jail. An instance of this class represents one of those 40 board spaces.
